## validHtmlId() function

Converts id to valid html id

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function validHtmlId(id: string, charMap?: Object): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | Id that is going to be converted to valid html id |
|  charMap | Object | Character map used during normalization |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
